channel.title: Runescape is going to ban my autoer!
channel.description:
Runescape has got my account for breaking rule number 7. macroin. But i can appeal my ban for choosing some of next:
1.I would like to apologise 2.I think Customer Support have made a mistake 3.Someone else had access to my account
So, I'm asking fo you, whose can know better. :D Which one should I choose?

item.title: Runescape is going to ban my autoer!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I’ve used option 1 before, and it worked.

Just say something like “I really wanted this thing, and I couldn’t get it, so I tried cheating. Now, I just feel so bad. I don’t know what I have done to myself. Not playing runescape is a tough thing for me, I love this game. Could I please get my account back, it will never happen again, I promise.”

Play legit for a day or two, and you will be unflagged.

Read full topic

item.source: Runescape is going to ban my autoer!

item.title: Runescape is going to ban my autoer!
item.dc:creator: @ScarScape ScarScape
item.description:
@ScarScape wrote:

No, no way number 1. they just could be sure about that I was autoing, and then tehy ban me. i have one other question, Can Jagex ban you by IP? So you can’t go to runescape even with other account?

So, if I can’t say number 1. there is left 2 and 3. And Jagex can see that from what IP you have connected, right? Only I have played with that account, and only from one IP. So, if i say number 3. They can see that it’s wrong. So should I say number 2.?

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape is going to ban my autoer!

item.title: Runescape is going to ban my autoer!
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“ScarScape, post:1, topic:11080”]Runescape has got my account for breaking rule number 7. macroin. But i can appeal my ban for choosing some of next:

1.I would like to apologise
2.I think Customer Support have made a mistake
3.Someone else had access to my account

So, I’m asking fo you, whose can know better. Which one should I choose?
(number 1. is out, because they just could know what i have autoed)[/quote]

Hmmm, this is a hard one because one time i was reported vor item scamming i i didnt do anything even the evidence part didnt have anything, so i said number 2 and got banned.

I said i was sorry for real world trading and they let me away with it.

Dont say someone else had access to your account unless you were on a computer you are not usually on,

I would say number 1. i would like to apologise!

Read full topic
